rules_text:
Whenever you make first contact, create a Treasure token. [i](You make first contact the first time each turn you cast a spell with a name not in your graveyard or control already.)[/i]
{T}, Return an artifact with mana value X you control to its owner's hand: You may cast a spell with mana value X plus 1 or less and with a different name from your hand without paying its mana cost.
